summary:
Superman, a famous superhero, was created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster in 1938. He first appeared in DC Comics' *Action Comics*. Superman, born Kal-El on Krypton, was sent to Earth as a baby, where he was raised by the Kents. He became Clark Kent, a journalist in Metropolis, with amazing powers like super strength. He uses his abilities to fight crime as Superman, wearing a colorful costume.

With his alias, Superman battles villains like Lex Luthor while inspiring others with his goodness. He is considered the classic superhero, setting the standard for the genre and remaining popular for decades.
title: Superman
